project.name: removestate
project.description: This model demonstrates how to facilitate the transition of a stateful part of a model to a stateless part of a model.

window-source.name: sourceWindow
window-source.description: The Source window in this model receives input data from a CSV file containing stock market trades. The input data specifies a unique ID for each trade, the stock market symbol of the purchased stock, the "true_test" value for each trade and the cost of purchasing the stock for each trade.

window-remove-state.name: removestateWindow
window-remove-state.description: A Remove State window facilitates the transition of a stateful part of a model to a stateless part of a model. A Remove State window converts all events that it receives into Inserts and adds a field namedÂ eventNumber. This field is the only key field of a Remove State window.

window-copy.name: copyWindow
window-copy.description: This Copy window retains the data from the Remove State window according to the set retention policy, which in this model, is 30 seconds.
